name: tag-each-camera-feed-with-the-relevant-uri;issue-lt-253-issue-lt-57-traffic-camera-regression-browser-chrome-context-chrome-feature-lt28-traffic-cameras-lt-62-view-live-traffic-camera-capability-lt-28-traffic-cameras

tags.name: LT 28 Traffic Cameras/LT-62 View Live Traffic Camera

title: Tag each camera feed with the relevant URI

testSteps.description: Given I am at the LiveTraffic Website
When I click on the menu button
And I click "Traffic Cameras" button from the menu list

Then I should see list of Camera regions from All Cameras tab
| Camera_Region |
| Inner Sydney |
| Sydney North |
| Sydney West |
| Sydney South |
| Regional North |
| Regional South |
| All Regional |
| All NSW |
| All Sydney |
When I click "Inner Sydney" button from All Cameras List
Then I should Camera Region name "Inner Sydney" on page
When I click on camera location "Alison Road (Randwick)"
Then I should see relevant URI "alison-road-randwick" for camera location "Alison Road (Randwick)"
